solution_line_template: It takes Max {fertilize_multiplier} * {mow_time} minutes = <<{fertilize_multiplier}*{mow_time}={fertilize_time}>>{fertilize_time} minutes to fertilize the lawn.
In total, Max takes {fertilize_time} minutes + {mow_time} minutes = <<{fertilize_time}+{mow_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes to both mow and fertilize the lawn.
